      Collection<ImportRecord> ArXivImportMetadataSourceServiceImpl.findMatchingRecords​(Item item)
      Expect this method will be not used and erased from the interface soon
      Collection<ImportRecord> ArXivImportMetadataSourceServiceImpl.findMatchingRecords​(Query query)
      Finds records based on query object.
      ImportRecord ArXivImportMetadataSourceServiceImpl.getRecord​(String id)
      Get a single record of metadata from the arxiv by ArXiv ID.
      ImportRecord ArXivImportMetadataSourceServiceImpl.getRecord​(Query query)
      Get a single record from the ArXiv matching the query.
      Collection<ImportRecord> ArXivImportMetadataSourceServiceImpl.getRecords​(String query, int start, int count)
      Find the number of records matching the query string in ArXiv.
      Collection<ImportRecord> ArXivImportMetadataSourceServiceImpl.getRecords​(Query query)
      Find records based on a object query and convert them to a list metadata mapped in ImportRecord.
      int ArXivImportMetadataSourceServiceImpl.getRecordsCount​(String query)
      Find the number of records matching the query string in ArXiv;
      int ArXivImportMetadataSourceServiceImpl.getRecordsCount​(Query query)
      Find the number of records matching a query; The entry with the key "query" of the Query's map will be used to get the query string.
